trans-unit.source: The real estate will be displayed on the website.
Here you can enter the internal object number.
Here you can enter the external object number.
From when should the object be active in the real estate portal.
Until when should the object be active in the real estate portal.
Here you can enter the OpenImmo object ID.
Here you can enter the identification source
Date of the last change in the exporting system.
Please select the provider of the property.
Please select the contact person for the property.
Enter the alias of the real estate here or leave the field blank to generate the alias automatically.
Here you can enter the postal code of the property.
Here you can enter the country of the property.
Here you can enter the location of the property.
Here you can enter the street of the property.
Here you can enter the house number of the property.
Here you can enter the regional addition of the property.
Here you can enter the state of the property.
Here you can enter the latitude of the property.
Here you can enter the longitude of the property.
Here you can enter the location of the property.
Number of the apartment for residential complexes.
Here you can specify the type of location for the property.
Here you can enter the community code of the property.
Here you can specify if the address of the property should be displayed for visitors on the website.
The property is available for purchase.
The property is available for rent / for lease.
The property is available for hereditary leasehold.
The property is available for lease.
Here you can enter the title of the property.
Here you can select the property type of the real estate.
Here you can enter the type of use for the property.
This property is available as a vacational property.
Here you can specify whether residential real estate should also be available for commercial use.
Define here for which industries the commercial use is possible.
Here you can enter the date of availability.
Define here when the object is available/ready for takeover
Define here until when the object is available.
Minimum period for which the property must be rented.
Maximum period for which the property can be rented.
Define the date of the auction here.
Here you can define the type of room.
Here you can define the type of apartment.
Here you can define the type of house.
Here you can define the type of real estate.
Here you can define the type of office.
Here you can define the type of trade.
Here you can define the type of hospitality / lodging industry.
Here you can define the type of of hall / production hall.
Here you can define the type of agriculture.
Here you can define the type of parking space.
Here you can define special / other types.
Here you can define the type of leisure area.
Here you can define the type of interest.
Please enter the page title. Leave it empty to use the property title.
Here you can define how search engines handle the page. If left empty, the parent page will set the robots tag.

Here you can enter a short description of the page which will be evaluated by search engines like Google or Yahoo. Search engines usually indicate between 150 and 300 characters. Leave it empty to use the property description.
Here you can define a tercet / teaser text for the real estate.
Here you can define the purchase price of the real estate.
Here you can define the purchase price (net) of the real estate.
Here you can define the purchase price (gross) of the real estate.
Here you can define the basic rent of the real estate. Also known as cold rent (basic rent only with no additional costs included such as utilities payment and maintenance).
Here you can define the base rent (net) of the real estate. Also known as basic net rent.

Here you can define the gross rent of the real estate. This may include heating (but not electricity), utility costs, additional costs such as water property tax, chimney sweeping, street cleaning and waste disposal.
Here you can define the price of the real estate as free text.
Here you can define the ancillary costs of the real estate.
Are the heating costs included in the ancillary costs?
Here you can define the heating costs of the real estate.
Here you can define the heating costs (net) of the real estate.
Here you can define the heating costs VAT. VAT is a short form for value-added tax.
Add a VAT (value-added-tax) to the real estate.
Here you can define additional rental surcharges.
Is being differentiated in other countries such as austria due to different sales tax.
Here you can define the head lease rent sales tax.
Here you can define a flat rate rent of the real estate.
Here you can define the operating costs (net) of the real estate.
Here you can define the operating costs (with sales tax) of the real estate.
Maintenance, renewal and improvement contribution (net). Similar to maintenance reserve.
Maintenance / Renewal and improvement fund (with sales tax)
Maintenance, renewal and improvement contribution with sales tax. Similar to maintenance reserve.
Here you can define the total rent (net). Total rent is rent with all charges included.
Here you can define the total rent with sales tax. Total rent is rent with all charges included.
Here you can define the total rent (gross).
Here you can define the total load (net).
Here you can define the total load (with sales tax).
Here you can define the total load (gross)
Here you can define the starting value of the total costs per sqm.
Total costs per sqm up to
Here you can define the final value of total costs per sqm.
Here you can define the monthly costs (net).
Here you can define the monthly costs with sales tax.
Here you can define the monthly costs (gross).
Here you can define the starting value of ancillary costs per sqm.
Ancillary costs per sqm up to
Here you can define the final value of ancillary costs per sqm.
Here you can define the reserves (net).
Here you can define the reserves with sales tax
Here you can define other costs (net).
Here you can define other costs with sales tax.
Here you can define other rents (net).
Here you can define other rents with sales tax.
Here you can define the total rent (net).
Here you can define the total rent with sales tax.
Here you can define the starting value of the rent (net) per sqm.
Here you can define the final value of the rent (net) per sqm.
Here you can define the leasehold value of the real estate.
Here you can define the hereditary leasehold value of the real estate.
Here you can define the common charges / homeowners association fee of the real estate.
Here you can define the installment payment. Meaning that furnishings and fixtures can or have to be purchased / acquired.
Here you can define the start value of the price period.
Here you can define the end value of the price period.
Here you can define the price per time unit.
Here you can define the rental price per sqm.
Here you can define the purchase price per sqm.
Is the property subject to commission?
Split commission payment for partner transactions.
Split commission payment for partner transactions.
Here you can enter the internal commission payment. In case of brokering or verification transactions enter it as an amount in ? / % / MM.
Please enter the VAT (Value added tax) of the internal commission payment.
Here you can enter the commission payment that has to be paid by the customer. Please enter it as an amount in ? / % / MM.
Please enter the VAT (Value added tax) of the external commission payment.
Here you can define a commission information text.
Here you can define the commission (net).
Here you can define the commission with sales tax included.
Here you can define the commission (gross).
Define here the currency in which the object is marketed.
Please enter the total value added tax in case there is different VAT rates.
Please enter the n-times purchase price based on the annual rent.
Here you can define the net yield in %.
Here you can define the net yield 'target' in %.
Here you can define the net yield 'Actual' in %.
Rental income per actual period (german: Ist-Periode)
Define the rental income period here (german: Ist-Periode).
Rental income per target period (german: Soll-Mieteinnahmen)
Rental income per target period (german: Soll-Periode)
Define the rental income period here (german: Soll-Periode).
Here you can define the infrastructure and improvement costs of the real estate.
Here you can define the deposit for the real estate.
Here you can define the deposit text for the real estate.
Here you can define the credit balances (commercial)
Here you can define a target value for purchase/rental price which will be used to sort your real estate if no purchase/rental price have been specified.
Here you can define a target value per squaremeter for purchase/rental price which will be used to sort your real estate if no purchase/rental price have been specified.
Here you can define the date from when the offer phase starts.
Here you can define a date for a viewing appointment.
Here you can define an alternative date for a viewing appointment.
Here you can define the start of the bidding period.
Here you can define the end of the bidding period.
Define here whether the highest bid may be displayed.
Here you can define the minimum bid.
Define here if the object is foreclosed.
Here you can define the file number of the foreclosure.
Here you can define the foreclosure date.
Define here an additional date of the foreclosure sale.
Define the responsible district court here.
Define here the price that could probably be achieved in free sale.
Here you can specify the living space of the real estate.
Here you can specify the usable space of the real estate.
Please specify the total area of the real estate.
Here you can specify the the shop space.
Here you can specify the storage space.
Here you can specify the area for sale.
Here you can specify the open area.
Here you can specify the office space.
Here you can specify the partial office space.
Here you can specify the glass facade of the real estate.
Here you can specify the administrative area of the real estate.
Here you can specify the restaurant area.
Here you can specify the site cover / plot coverage of your real estate.
Here you can specify the Floor-area ratio / floor space index of your real estate.
Here you can specify the cubic index of your real estate.
Enter here the gross floor area number (according to Din277) of the object.
Here you can specify the plot area / lot area of your real estate.
Here you can specify an other area for your real estate.
Here you can specify the balcony / terrace area of your real estate.
Here you can specify the garden area of your real estate.
Here you can specify the cellar / basement area of your real estate.
Here you can specify the sqm of the glass facade.
Here you can specify the depth of the plot towards the street in meters (m).
Here you can specify the area of attic for your real estate.
Here you can specify the heated area.
Here you can specify the rentable area.
Here you can specify the type of parking space for your real estate.
Here you can specify the amount of parking spaces.
Here you can specify the amount of carports.
Here you can specify the carport rent.
Here you can specify the carport purchase price.
Here you can specify the amount of duplex parking.
Here you can specify the duplex rent.
Here you can specify the duplex purchase price.
Here you can specify the amount of outdoor parking spaces.
Here you can specify the outdoor parking space rent.
Here you can specify the outdoor parking space purchase price.
Here you can enter the amount of garage parking spaces.
Here you can specify the amount of garage rent.
Here you can specify the garage purchase price.
Here you can enter the amount of parking garage spaces.
Here you can specify the parking garage space rent.
Here you can specify the parking garage space purchase price.
Please enter the amount of underground parking spaces.
Please specify the underground garage rent.
Please specify the underground garage purchase price.
Please enter the amount of other parking spaces.
Please specify the type of other parking spaces.
Please specify the rent for other parking spaces.
Purchase price for other parking spaces
Please specify the purchase price for other parking spaces.
Please enter a text for other parking spaces.
Here you can select the furnishing category for your real estate.
Here you can select the bathroom furnishings for your real estate.
Here you can select the kitchen furnishings for your real estate.
Here you can select the types of occuring floor.
Here you can select the type of heating / heaters (e.g. space heater, floor heating).
Here you can select the type of firing / heating
Here you can select the elevator type.
Please select the orientation of the balcony/terrace
Please specify if the real estate is already furnished.
Here you can select the connected gastronomies (e.g. restaurants).
Here you can select available services.
Here you can select available security.
Does the real estate have cable / seatellite tv?
Does the real estate have DVBT?
Does the real estate have a sauna?
Does the real estate have a swimming pool?
Does the real estate provide a room for hanging and drying laundry?
Does the real estate have a winter garden?
Does the real estate provide DV-cable?
Does the real estate have a ramp?
Does the real estate have a lifting ramp?
Does the real estate have a crane?
Does the real estate have a guest terrace?
Amount of the power connection value in KW.
Does the real estate have a canteen or cafeteria?
Does the real estate have a kitchenette?
Height of the hall in m.
Is the property tied to a beer supply agreement?
Does the real estate offer sports facilities?
Does the real estate have a wellness area?
Does the real estate have a phone?
Does the real estate have broadband access?
Here you can enter the internet speed.
Here you can choose the type of broadband.
Here you can choose the type of cellar if one exists.
Does the real estate have UMTS reception?
Does the real estate have a storage room?
Does the real estate offer a room to store bikes in?
Are there roller shutters on the windows?
Does the real estate offer a library?
Does the real estate have an attic?
Does the real estate have a toilet for guests?
Does the real estate offer cable tv?
Is the real estate suitable for older people?
Do you offer a macro map for the real estate?
Do you offer a micro map for the real estate?
Do you offer a virtual tour for this real estate?
Do you offer aerial photographs for this real estate?
Define here if Granny annexe is present.
The volume of a structure in m³.
Ratio between plot area and gross floor area; defines the maximum permissible overbuilding of a plot of land.
For commercial objects in rent and buy.
For commercial objects in rent and buy.
Is the real estate suitable for flat share?
Does the real estate offer a fireplace?
Is the real estate air conditioned?
Can you use a garden in this real estate?
Please enter the year of construction of the real estate.
Here you can enter the last modernization date of the real estate.
Here you can specify the condition of the real estate.
Please enter the type / the age of your real estate.
Is the property in a developed area?
Please specify the building zone of the real estate
General information about existing contaminated sites.
Here you can specify the view / panorama.
Here you can enter the distance to the closest airport.
Here you can enter the distance to the closest railway station.
Here you can enter the distance to the closest highway.
Here you can enter the distance to the closest subway.
Here you can enter the distance to the closest bus stop.
Here you can enter the distance to the closest kindergarten.
Here you can enter the distance to the closest primary school.
Here you can enter the distance to the closest lower secondary education school.
Here you can enter the distance to the closest secondary school.
Here you can enter the distance to the closest comprehensive school.
Here you can enter the distance to the closest high school.
Here you can enter the distance to the city centre.
Here you can enter the distance to the closest shopping facilities.
Here you can enter the distance to the closest restaurant.
Here you can enter the distance to the beach (sport).
Here you can enter the distance to the closest lake (sport).
Here you can enter the distance to the sea (sport).
Here you can enter the distance to the closest skiing area (sport).
Here you can enter the distance to the closest sports facility (sport).
Here you can enter the distance to the closest hiking area (sport).
Here you can enter the distance to the closest local recreation (sport).
Here you can specify the type of building energy rating.
Here you can enter the date of validity of the building energy rating.
Here you can define the consumption value of the real estate. Values in kWh/(m²*a) Kilowatt per hour, m² and year.
Here you can define the final energy demand of the real estate. Values in kWh/(m²*a) Kilowatt per hour, m² and year.
Here you can specify the power source of the real estate.
Here you can define the current (electrical) value of the real estate.
Here you can define the thermal conductivity of the real estate.
Here you can define the efficiency rating of the real estate.
Please enter the year of construction for the building energy rating of the real estate.
Please enter the date of issue for the building energy rating of the real estate.
Please enter the year of the building energy rating of the real estate.
Here you can specify the type of building.
Here you can define the HWB value (heating demand).
Here you can define the HWB class (heating demand).
Here you can define the FGEE value (total energy efficiency factor).
Here you can define the FGEE class (total energy efficiency factor).
Here you can select a cover picture for the real estate.
Here you can select pictures for the real estate.
Here you can select a picture for the floor plan of the real estate.
Here you can select pictures for the interior of the real estate.
Here you can select pictures for the real estate exterior.
Here you can select map pictures for the real estate.
Here you can select panorama photos for the real estate.
Here you can select a picture for the building energy rating / energy passport.
Here you can select a picture for a QR-Code for the real estate.
Here you can select a logo for the real estate company.
Here you can select various documents for the real estate.
Here you can enter forwarding links for the real estate (e.g. external videos from youtube, virtual tours).
Do you allow the real estate to be transferred to other platforms?
Here you can enter platforms (separated by semicola) that you want the real estate to be passed to.
Here you can enter platforms (separated by semicola) which you DO NOT want the real estate to be passed to.
WBS needed / Social living (WBS is an official german document certifying tenant's financial hardship)
Here you can specify whether smoking in this real estate is not allowed.
Are pets allowed in this real estate?
Defines whether the object may be rented only to women or only to men.
This real estate is a listed building.
Are you able to modify rooms in this real estate?
Define here if the real estate is in a high-rise building.
Group number/master object if objects are grouped or a common master object.
From when there is access to the object.
Here you can enter the duration.
Max. Number of people who can live/sleep in the object.
Here you can specify the area (german: Flurangaben).
Here you can specify the land lot details.
Here you can specify the district (german: Gemarkung).
Here you can specify the floor that the real estate is on.
Here you can enter the number of the floors of the building.
Here you can enter the total number of rooms.
Here you can enter the total number of bedrooms.
Here you can enter the total number of bathrooms.
Here you can enter the total number of separated toilet rooms.
Here you can enter the total number of balconies.
Here you can enter the total number of terraces.
Here you can enter the total number of loggias.
Here you can enter the total number of bed-sitting rooms.
Number of places in the guest room(s).
Number of beds in the hotel/pension.
Here you can enter the total number of conference rooms.
Here you can enter the total number of residential units.
Here you can enter the total number of commercial units.
Show the details of real estate ID %s
Here you can enter when the property should be divided.
Here you can choose the sales status of your real estate.
Here you can select the language of your real estate.
